ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: There are six bards in my guild over 30.  Five of them are 46+ and you have me at 39.  I play a mage as my primary now so its highly unlikely that number will
ygData.messageBody:
There are six bards in my guild over 30. Five of them are 46+ and you have me at 39. I play a mage as my primary now so its highly unlikely that number will move.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 2:06 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] bards in guilds...


Just a quick question. How many bards above 30 are there in your guilds?

The more i play, the less bards i realize there are. When i do a /who all
bard in my guild, i count 2 bards at the most, me and a lev 52 (unless
there's a hidden one somewhere). How sad is that? do a /who all warrior or
any other class in the guild and you'll see on average 7. Mind you in a
weird way this is to my advantage as whenever i'm planes capable, i wont
have to lotto for imbrued since she's got a full set, a breath of harmony
and a partisan. But still, i still wish there were more bards around but i
think the numbers will keep dropping as i read this mailing list 8(

P.S. got my ss helm, in a weird way, im kinda happy the effect doesnt work
for me yet. I cant wait to see myself in imbrued/ss together, i think the
green and yellow look cool together.

"you have slain an Eye of Minkin" *sigh*

Minkin
Valorium
Sol Ro


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
